medical_history.chief_complaint: Difficult weaning from mechanical ventilation following right pneumonectomy.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient experienced multiple septic episodes and unresolving bronchopleural fistula, complicating the postoperative course. The difficulty in weaning from mechanical ventilation began immediately following surgery and persisted, with definitive closure of the leak obtained 28 days postoperatively. The patient experienced major sleep disturbances, extreme anxiety, and apprehension due to life-threatening episodes during awareness.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of pulmonary tuberculosis, ischemic heart disease, gout, psoriasis, heavy smoking, and previous alcohol abuse.
medical_history.social_history: Heavy smoking and previous alcohol abuse.
